      • SplitImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] SplitImage(java.awt.Image src,
                                                 int frames,
                                                 int frameW,
                                                 int frameH)
        Splits an image into individual frames from a strip format
        Parameters:
        src - Image containing all frames of an image
        frames - Number of frames in the image
        frameW - Width of each frame
        frameH - Height of each frame
        Returns:
        Array of all the frames as BufferedImage

      • SplitImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] SplitImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage src,
                                                 int frames,
                                                 int framesAcross,
                                                 int framesDown,
                                                 int frameW,
                                                 int frameH)
        Splits a animation sequence into individual frames from a Sprite Sheet Format
        Parameters:
        src - The source image containing all the frames to be split
        frames - The number of frames contained in the src
        framesAcross - number of frames in each Row
        framesDown - number of frames in each Column
        frameW - The width of each frame
        frameH - The height of each frame
        Returns:
        BufferedImage array containing every frame of the animation
